pages.text: Sphenotitan is a basal sphenodont reptile from the Late Triassic of Argentina. It was relatively large for rhynchocephalians (tuataras and relatives) with a skull length of 100 mm. Sphenotitan is believed to be herbivorous based on its dentition in fossil specimens
